meanings.sent2: He nodded unquestioningly when asked to help.
meanings.sent3: The robot obeyed unquestioningly, even when it didn't make sense.
meanings.sent4: The loyal dog wagged its tail unquestioningly at its owner's command.
meanings.sent5: The soldier saluted unquestioningly, showing his unwavering loyalty.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows complete trust or obedience.
meanings.sent1: The child looked up at his parents unquestioningly.
meanings.sent2: She followed her mentor's advice unquestioningly.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred unquestioningly as its owner petted it.
meanings.sent4: The sunflowers unquestioningly turned towards the sun's warmth.
meanings.sent5: The audience applauded unquestioningly, impressed by the performance.
